typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(DEPARTMENT_ID=="10",
	DEPARTMENT_ID=="20",
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(d10, d20, others)
ConditionalSplit1@d10 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['employees-split-d10.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@d20 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['employees-split-d20.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@others sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['employees-split-other.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink3
